content:
Diagnosis:
Left breast cancer - Grade 3 pleomorphic lobular carcinoma, pT2N1M0
ER strongly positive (90%), PR negative, HER2 negative

Previous treatment:
Wide local excision and axillary clearance 15 Jan 2024
3/12 lymph nodes positive, largest deposit 12mm

Current treatment:
Adjuvant FEC chemotherapy

Current situation:
Pre cycle 4 FEC

Treatment tolerance:
Cycles 1-3 completed with good tolerance
Grade 1 fatigue and nausea only
No neutropenic episodes
Maintaining work 3 days per week

Clinical Progress:
Breast wound well healed
No new symptoms
Weight stable at 68kg
Performance status 0

Plan:
Proceed with cycle 4 FEC today
Routine bloods and toxicity check pre cycle 5
Follow up in 3 weeks
Plan for radiotherapy and endocrine therapy to follow completion of chemotherapy

primary_cancer.biomarker_status: ER strongly positive (90%), PR negative, HER2 negative

cancer_timeline.value: Wide local excision and axillary clearance performed
Completed cycles 1-3 FEC with good tolerance, grade 1 fatigue and nausea only

status_updates.value: Early breast cancer post surgery, tolerating adjuvant FEC chemotherapy well with minimal side effects
Grade 1 fatigue and nausea only, no neutropenic episodes
Routine bloods and toxicity check pre cycle 5
